name: Bulwark (danos)
description:
This is my entry for the 2019 GDL Christmas Jam.  I've always wanted to make a top-down shooter, so I gave it a shot. This was my first game jam, and I think I definitely bit off a bit more than I could chew. I was pretty strapped for time, so I didn't have time to make any decent looking game graphics of my own other than the menus and such. I plan on improving this game in the future. This is just a prototype. After all, that's what game jams are for. Thanks  for checking out the game.

Programming by me
Game assets borrowed from https://www.kenney.nl/
Music from https://www.bensound.com/
